example.eg: I wonder if wine can be made from cherries.  I wonder if that film is still showing at the cinema.
example.egtrans: 我很好奇樱桃是否可以做酒。让我上网查查看。

example.eg: I wonder if you would be interested in buying this car over here.
example.egtrans: 我不知道您是否有意购买这边的这辆车。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 想知道, 不知道…是否

example.eg: The child's wonder at the kaleidoscope never ended.
example.egtrans: 那孩子对万花筒惊讶不已。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 惊奇, 惊诧, 惊诧

example.eg: Penicillin was once considered a wonder drug.
example.egtrans: 青霉素曾一度被认为是一种不可思议的奇药。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 神奇的, 不可思议的, 非凡的

example.eg: This baby has been such a wonder for us.
example.egtrans: 这个宝宝对我们来说简直是个奇迹。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 神童, 奇迹, 不可思议的事物

example.eg: The Panama Canal is one of the wonders of the modern world.
example.egtrans: 巴拿马运河是现代世界的奇观之一。

trans_examp.trans_cn: （自然界的）奇观, 奇景, 奇迹

example.eg: He could not believe what he saw.  He just wondered at it.
example.egtrans: 他简直不能相信自己的亲眼所见，对其感到十分惊奇。

example.eg: Sometimes I wonder about the origins of the universe and where we came from.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 想知道, 对…感到奇怪

example.eg: Gazing at the night sky never ceases to fill me with wonder.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 令…吃惊, 令…感到惊讶

example.eg: Penicillin was called a miracle drug when it first came out because it stopped infections.
No wonder the house is so cold, the heater is broken!  No wonder the baby is crying, his diaper needs to be changed.
example.egtrans: 宝宝需要换尿布了，难怪他哭个不停。

example.eg: When their song became a best-seller, the band thought they were going to be successful for life; however, they unfortunately ended up being a one hit wonder.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 神奇小子, 有非凡成就的年轻人

dsense.name: wonder of the world, Wonder of the World

trans_examp.trans_cn: 世界奇迹, 世界奇观
